hibernate-mapping.query: select P from Profile P where P.UserId = :UserId and P.IsActive = 1
select P from Profile P where (P.FirstName like :Name) OR (P.MiddleName like :Name) OR (P.LastName like :Name) and P.IsActive = 1
select P from Profile P where (P.Location = :location) OR (P.ZipCode = :zipcode) and P.IsActive = 1
select P from Profile P where (P.Location = :location) AND (P.ZipCode = :zipcode) and P.IsActive = 1
